      protected boolean writeRegister(byte[] register, int data) throws DeviceCommunicationException
      Internal method that writes a register
      Parameters:
      register - the register to write
      data - the data to write
      Returns:
      true if the write is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DeviceCommunicationException - if the write fails

      data - the data to write
      Returns:
